system.description:
You have learned to combine your athleticism and self-mastery with your zealous commitment to your ideals. You gain the following benefits:

  • The Unarmed school is treated as an additional herald school for you.
  • If you use Flurry of Blows after using Divine Smite on the same turn, the unarmed attacks you make as part of Flurry of Blows count as magical and deal additional radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • You can spend 1 exertion point to use Lay on Hands as a bonus action.
  • When taking a long rest, you can use 10 points from your Lay on Hands pool instead of 1 supply. You can only use this benefit on yourself. If you do, your number of available Lay on Hands points is reduced by 10 when you finish the long rest.
  • Half your adept levels count as herald levels for the purpose of the Sacred Aura and Greater Sacred Aura features.
  • Half your herald levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the Empty Mind feature.
